comments.body: Do you need to insert new lines before / after the `super();`?
After the codefix is inserted, it is formatted, and that appears to take care of the issue.

`super()` is not accurate here, we do not know if the base class takes one or more parameters. not sure what is the right thing to do here. we could 1. disable the whole fix if the base constructor has required parameters, but this seems too drastic, 2. insert a snippet of sorts, not sure how though.
